title: Identify the Unknown
text: We are looking for the total time that the journey took, and we can name it "h"

title: Translate
text: We can use the formula $$distance=rate time$$ --> $$d=rt$$

title: Substitute
text: Since we are given that the distance is 520 miles and the rate is 65 mph, we can substitute $$d=520$$, $$r=65$$ and get $$520=65t$$.

title: Solve
text: Solve for t in $$520=65t$$. (hint: divide both sides by 65.) What is t?
